title: Zod schema missing claudeSessions and claude-sessions source
description: Found in moltbot-sz1.2: MemorySearchSchema in zod-schema.agent-runtime.ts:303-406 is missing (1) claudeSessions config object and (2) claude-sessions literal in sources array. Config with claudeSessions or sources: ["claude-sessions"] will fail validation.

title: Unified Memory: Index Claude Code sessions
description:
> Index ~/.claude/projects/ sessions into moltbot memory, enabling search across phone (Telegram) and direct CLI usage.

## Key Insight

**Separate parser for Claude format, not a format flag.** Claude JSONL uses `type: "user"/"assistant"` vs moltbot `type: "message"`. Rather than adding conditionals to existing parser, create `claude-session-files.ts` alongside `session-files.ts`. Keeps parsers focused and testable.

## Architecture

claude-sessions is a **file indexing pipeline** parallel to existing sessions source:

```
~/.claude/projects/*/*.jsonl
    → listClaudeSessionFiles()
    → buildClaudeSessionEntry() [extracts text, project slug]
    → deduplicateBySessionId() [skip moltbot-originated sessions]
    → indexFile() [existing chunking + embedding]
    → search() [with optional project filter]
```

## Public API

| Function | Signature | Purpose |
|----------|-----------|---------|
| `listClaudeSessionFiles` | `() -> Promise<string[]>` | Glob ~/.claude/projects/*/*.jsonl |
| `buildClaudeSessionEntry` | `(absPath: string) -> Promise<ClaudeSessionEntry \| null>` | Parse Claude JSONL, extract project |
| `extractProjectSlug` | `(sessionPath: string) -> string` | -home-ben-projects-mine → mine |
| `loadMoltbotSessionIds` | `(agentId: string) -> Promise<Set<string>>` | Get Claude session IDs from moltbot sessions.json |
| `syncClaudeSessionFiles` | `(params) -> Promise<void>` | Index with deduplication |

## Types

```typescript
type ClaudeSessionEntry = SessionFileEntry & {
  project: string;  // extracted slug (e.g., "mine", "moltbot")
  claudeSessionId: string;  // from filename for dedup
};

// Extended search options
interface MemorySearchOptions {
  maxResults?: number;
  minScore?: number;
  sessionKey?: string;
  project?: string;  // filter to specific Claude Code project
}
```

## Modules

| Module | Purpose |
|--------|---------|
| claude-session-files | Parse Claude Code JSONL format, extract project metadata |
| sync-claude-sessions | Index claude-sessions source with deduplication |
| memory-search (extend) | Add claude-sessions to sources type |
| manager (extend) | Integrate claude-sessions sync |
| memory-cli (extend) | Add --project flag |

## User Workflows

| ID | Workflow | Validates |
|----|----------|-----------|
| WF-1 | User runs `clawdbot memory sync` → Claude sessions indexed alongside moltbot sessions | UC-UM-1, UC-UM-2, UC-UM-3, UC-UM-4, UC-UM-5, UC-UM-6, UC-UM-8, UC-UM-9, UC-UM-12 |
| WF-2 | User runs `clawdbot memory search "query" --project mine` → Results filtered to project | UC-UM-7, UC-UM-10, UC-UM-11 |

## Config Schema

```json
{
  "sources": ["memory", "sessions", "claude-sessions"],
  "claudeSessions": {
    "enabled": true,
    "path": "~/.claude/projects"
  }
}
```

---
Exit criteria: `clawdbot memory search "query" --project mine` returns results from ~/.claude/projects/-home-ben-projects-mine/

title: UC-UM-1: Add claude-sessions source type
description:
## Participates in
WF-1: Index Claude sessions

## Touches
- `src/agents/memory-search.ts:ResolvedMemorySearchConfig`
- `src/agents/memory-search.ts:normalizeSources`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** sources type is `Array<"memory" | "sessions">`
**When:** claude-sessions feature is implemented
**Then:** sources accepts `"claude-sessions"` as valid value

## Contract
- Input: config with `sources: ["claude-sessions"]`
- Output: resolved config includes `"claude-sessions"` in sources array
- Errors: none (invalid sources ignored)

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm build && grep -q "claude-sessions" dist/agents/memory-search.js`

title: UC-UM-10: Add project filter to search
description:
## Participates in
WF-2

## Touches
- `src/memory/manager.ts:search`
- `src/memory/manager-search.ts:buildSearchQuery`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** chunks indexed with project metadata
**When:** search() called with project option
**Then:** returns only chunks matching project filter

## Contract
- Input: `options: { query: string, project?: string, maxResults?: number }` — search options
- Output: `SearchResult[]` — filtered to specified project
- Errors: empty array when project has no indexed content

## Notes
- Add WHERE clause: `AND (project = ? OR ? IS NULL)`
- Pass project through to vector and FTS queries

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm test src/memory/manager-search.test.ts -t "project filter"`

title: UC-UM-12: Add file watcher for Claude projects
description:
## Participates in
WF-1: Index Claude sessions (incremental)

## Touches
- `src/memory/manager.ts:ensureSessionListener`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** claude-sessions source enabled with watch=true
**When:** new session file created in ~/.claude/projects/
**Then:** file watcher triggers incremental sync

## Contract
- Input: config with sync.watch=true and sources includes claude-sessions
- Output: watcher on ~/.claude/projects/**/*.jsonl
- Errors: watcher failure logged but does not crash

## Notes
- Use same chokidar pattern as existing session watcher
- Debounce with watchDebounceMs

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm test src/memory/manager.test.ts -t "claude watcher"`

title: UC-UM-5: Parse Claude JSONL format
description:
## Participates in
WF-1: Index Claude sessions

## Touches
- `src/memory/claude-session-files.ts:buildClaudeSessionEntry`
- `src/memory/claude-session-files.ts:extractClaudeSessionText`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** Claude JSONL with `{"type": "user", "message": {...}}` and `{"type": "assistant", "message": {...}}`
**When:** buildClaudeSessionEntry() called with file path
**Then:** returns entry with extracted text content, project slug, session ID

## Contract
- Input: `absPath: string` — path to Claude session .jsonl file
- Output: `Promise<ClaudeSessionEntry | null>` — entry with path, content, hash, project, claudeSessionId
- Errors: returns null if file unreadable or empty

## Notes
- Accept `type: "user"` and `type: "assistant"` (not just `type: "message"`)
- Extract only `text` blocks from content arrays
- Skip `tool_use` and `tool_result` blocks

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm test src/memory/claude-session-files.test.ts -t buildClaudeSessionEntry`

title: UC-UM-6: Load moltbot session IDs for dedup
description:
## Participates in
WF-1: Index Claude sessions (deduplication)

## Touches
- `src/memory/claude-session-files.ts:loadMoltbotClaudeSessionIds`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** moltbot sessions.json contains claudeCliSessionId for sessions
**When:** loadMoltbotClaudeSessionIds(agentId) called
**Then:** returns Set of Claude session IDs that originated from moltbot

## Contract
- Input: `agentId: string` — moltbot agent ID
- Output: `Promise<Set<string>>` — set of Claude session IDs to skip
- Errors: returns empty set if sessions.json missing or malformed

## Notes
Location: ~/.clawdbot/state/agents/{agentId}/sessions/sessions.json
Field: entry.cliSessionIds["claude-cli"] or entry.claudeCliSessionId

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm test src/memory/claude-session-files.test.ts -t loadMoltbotClaudeSessionIds`

title: UC-UM-7: Add project column to chunks table
description:
## Participates in
WF-2

## Touches
- `src/memory/memory-schema.ts:createChunksTable`
- `src/memory/manager.ts:indexFileChunks`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** chunks table has no project column
**When:** claude-sessions indexed
**Then:** chunks table has project column, populated for claude-sessions source

## Contract
- Input: `chunk: { text: string, source: string, path: string, project?: string }` — project nullable for non-claude sources
- Output: `void` — chunk persisted with project column
- Errors: `Error` when migration fails on locked database

## Notes
- Column should be nullable (null for memory/sessions sources)
- Add index on (source, project) for filtered queries

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm test src/memory/memory-schema.test.ts -t "project column"`

title: UC-UM-8: Sync Claude session files
description:
## Participates in
WF-1: Index Claude sessions

## Touches
- `src/memory/sync-claude-sessions.ts:syncClaudeSessionFiles`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** Claude sessions exist in ~/.claude/projects/
**When:** syncClaudeSessionFiles() called with dedup set
**Then:** indexes all sessions except those in dedup set, stores with project metadata

## Contract
- Input: `{ db, excludeSessionIds: Set<string>, indexFile, ... }` — same pattern as syncSessionFiles
- Output: `Promise<void>` — files indexed
- Errors: skips unreadable files, continues with others

## Notes
- Follow same pattern as sync-session-files.ts
- Use source = "claude-sessions"
- Include project in chunk metadata

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm test src/memory/sync-claude-sessions.test.ts`

title: UC-UM-9: Integrate claude-sessions sync into manager
description:
## Participates in
WF-1: Index Claude sessions

## Touches
- `src/memory/manager.ts:sync`
- `src/memory/manager.ts:ensureSessionListener`

## Given/When/Then
**Given:** sources includes "claude-sessions"
**When:** manager.sync() called
**Then:** calls syncClaudeSessionFiles alongside syncSessionFiles

## Contract
- Input: resolved config with sources including "claude-sessions"
- Output: claude sessions indexed
- Errors: failure in claude-sessions sync does not block other sources

## Notes
- Check sources.includes("claude-sessions") before syncing
- Load dedup session IDs before sync
- Optionally add file watcher for ~/.claude/projects

## Acceptance
- [ ] `pnpm test src/memory/manager.test.ts -t "claude-sessions"`
